channel.title: Experience on 弦而時習之
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on 弦而時習之

item.title: TGONext: The plan for high concurrency
item.author: contact@frost.tw (蒼時弦也)
item.description:
Yesterday is the first meetup of the TGONext project, we are learning from Taiwan’s high-level technical leaders. After the opening, our mentor Ant let our polling for the topic we want to discuss in this half-year project time.

We decide to pick up 4 topics to discuss and the first topic is “high concurrency.”

item.title: Write a suitable RSpec test
item.author: contact@frost.tw (蒼時弦也)
item.description: Include me, write test is many people’s nightmare. Many junior programmers feel it is hard to define which should be tested. So, I decided to share my experience after I tech my colleague today.
